page.title: 13A Senior Barrowby Resident
page.content: Miss Pymm lives at Holly House, a lovely old stone cottage built of local limestone. It is situated opposite the post office in the middle of Barrowby village. She is the local secretary of the R.S.P.C.A. and is involved in fund raising activities such as coffee mornings and jumble sales. If any animals are in difficulty or hurt then Miss Pymm will help and will even find homes for them. She has several cats for company. Her numerous interests include looking after the Reading Room in Church Street, being a school governor at the local primary school and a member of Barrowby Church Council. She is very popular with everyone and always has a friendly greeting.
